name: mazanoke
description: Mazanoke is a lightweight self-hosted workflow and notification platform for task lists, deadlines, and schedules. It includes reminders, checklists, and user assignments with a clean interface.

features.title: Deadline Management
features.description: Set and track deadlines with visual indicators for upcoming and overdue items

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign tasks to team members and track responsibility across projects

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive reminders for upcoming deadlines and task assignments

features.title: Calendar Integration
features.description: View tasks and deadlines in calendar format for timeline visualization

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize tasks with custom tags for flexible filtering and grouping
